data.name: DmModMail
data.value: If you wish to discuss this with staff or feel this action is unjustified, please DM ModMail instead of posting about it in a public channel.

data.name: KickDescription
data.value:
{user.Mention}, you have been **kicked** from **{guild.Name}**. __This is not a permanent removal from the server__, but a way for staff to inform you that your behaviour needs to change if you wish to remain a member of the community in future.
Please take some time to reflect on the reason for this action, and return when you feel you are ready.

data.name: MessageFromStaff
data.value: {user.Mention}, you have received a message from **{guild.Name}**. __This is not an infraction__.

data.name: NoSuchUser
data.value: No user with the ID {id} could be found.

data.name: NotInGuild
data.value: User {user.Id} ({user.Mention}) was found, but is not in this guild.

data.name: StaffSentMessage
data.value: Staff member {staffMember.Mention} sent a message to {user.Mention}.

data.name: TemporaryMuteDescription
data.value: {user.Mention}, you have been **temporarily muted** from **{guild.Name}**. A temporary mute is a way for staff to let you cool off and reflect on your behaviour. Failing to follow the rules in future will result in further infractions. Accumulating too many infractions may lead to an indefinite removal from the server.

data.name: WarningDescription
data.value: {user.Mention}, you have received a **warning** from **{guild.Name}**. A warning is a way for staff to inform you that your behaviour needs to change, or further infractions will follow. Accumulating too many infractions may lead to an indefinite removal from the server.
